means: 伊壁鸠鲁（公元前342？-270，古希腊杰出唯物主义和无神论者）

sentence.Network_en: They love Epicurus and his simple pleasures from ancient Greece.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们热爱伊壁鸠鲁和这位哲学家在古希腊所享受的简单的快乐.

sentence.Network_en: Without confidence there is no friendship ─ Epicurus.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有信任,就没有友谊─伊壁鸠鲁.
伊比鸠鲁:这大便让我爽.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 近似字词-新浪字典 ... epicurism 贪口福,美食主义 epicurus 艾庇拉斯;人名 epicuticle 上表皮.
The Point of Joy about Epicurus and Ethical Reflection伊壁鸠鲁的快乐论及其伦理反思

means.word_mean: 1. Greek philosopher who believed that the world is a random combination of atoms and that pleasure is the highest good (341-270 BC)

auth_sentence.content: Epicurus is pointing to what the Zen Buddhists call the emptiness of striving.

auth_sentence.content: Pleasure is perhaps the key to comprehending the powerful impact of Epicurus' philosophy.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pleasure is perhaps the key to comprehending the powerful impact of Epicurus' philosophy.
